title: Athletic Academic Advising Certificate  · Angelo State University

paragraphs: Start or advance your career as an advisor for student-athletes on college or university campuses.
Master of Education (M.Ed.) in Coaching, Sport, Recreation and Fitness Administration
If you have problems accessing the application, please contact the College of Graduate Studies and Research at 325-942-2169 orgraduate.studies@angelo.edu.
(Upload unofficial transcripts, with the exception of Angelo State University transcripts, for application evaluation purposes using theGraduate Studies Documents for Submissionform.)

Note:The Department of Kinesiology will evaluate applicants on an individual basis who do not meet the overall/cumulative GPA of 2.5 or better. Applicants may be requested to provide the following by the Department of Kinesiology.
Applies ONLY to ASU currently enrolled undergraduate students
Note:Graduate courses taken as a Senior Graduate will not apply to a bachelorette degree.
This graduate-level certificate program consists of 15 credit hours. That means you only have to complete five courses to earn your certificate.
You are strongly encouraged to register for the first and second eight-week sessions simultaneously before the first eight-week session begins.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.

This certificate is part of the
All courses are offered totally online for you convenience.
Learn the organizational communication skills you need while you practice designing, implementing and promoting academic advising programs.
You can complete this program in 12 months or less, depending on course availability, your start date and how many courses you take each semester.
Apply Texasapplication.If you have problems accessing the application, please contact the College of Graduate Studies and Research at 325-942-2169 orgraduate.studies@angelo.edu.

Transcripts from baccalaureate degree awarding university or college(Upload unofficial transcripts, with the exception of Angelo State University transcripts, for application evaluation purposes using theGraduate Studies Documents for Submissionform.)Please do not send official transcript(s) until you have received a notice of acceptance from Angelo State University. Unless an unofficial transcript is not on hand, please request one.Official university transcripts should be sent through a secure electronic method (examples: Credential Solutions, Parchment, etc.) tograduate.studies@angelo.eduor by mail to:College of Graduate Studies and ResearchASU Station #11025San Angelo, Texas 76909-1025
Master’s degree from an accredited university
Bachelor’s degree from an accredited university
Must hold a bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university.
Overall/cumulative GPA of 2.5 or better, including all grades on repeated courses in any academic concentration.
Must schedule a meeting with the CSRF Graduate Advisor prior to applying.
Completed 100 or more semester credit hours toward a baccalaureate degree.
Spring B:Applications will open on Jan 22
Fall B:Applications will open on Aug 30
CSRF 6329: Athletic Academic Advising and Counseling
